Game should have been over at this point because curfew law made another inning impossible, but was allowed to continue until 6:59. Possibly out of spite, Giants Mgr Durocher had Behrman throw two wide balls to Kiner, who had 49 homers. Durocher may have thought inning would not count if not finished.1949PIT.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
